Jesus Is Coming

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* angel \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, “\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w true|strong="G4103"\w*. \w The|strong="G1722"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w sent|strong="G2316"\w* \w His|strong="G1722"\w* angel \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w show|strong="G1166"\w* \w His|strong="G1722"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w what|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w soon|strong="G5034"\w* \f + \fr 22:6 \ft Or suddenly or quickly; similarly in verses 7, 12, and 20\f* \w take|strong="G1096"\w* \w place|strong="G1096"\w*.”

“\w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w soon|strong="G5035"\w*. \w Blessed|strong="G3107"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w keeps|strong="G5083"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w book|strong="G3588"\w*.\f + \fr 22:7 \ft Or scroll; also in verses 9, 10, 18, 19\f*”

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1473"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* heard \w and|strong="G2532"\w* saw \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* heard \w and|strong="G2532"\w* seen \w them|strong="G3588"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w at|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* angel \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* \w shown|strong="G1166"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, “\w Do|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w seal|strong="G4972"\w* \w up|strong="G4972"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w prophecy|strong="G4394"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w book|strong="G3588"\w*, \w because|strong="G1063"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w near|strong="G1451"\w*.

“\w I|strong="G1473"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G3992"\w* \w My|strong="G1473"\w* angel \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G1473"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w for|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w churches|strong="G1577"\w*. \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Root|strong="G4491"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Offspring|strong="G1085"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w bright|strong="G2986"\w* \w Morning|strong="G4407"\w* Star.”

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w bride|strong="G3565"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Come|strong="G2064"\w*!” \w Let|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hears \w say|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Come|strong="G2064"\w*!” \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G2983"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w thirsty|strong="G1372"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w desires|strong="G2309"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w water|strong="G5204"\w* \w of|strong="G4151"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w drink|strong="G2532"\w* \w freely|strong="G1432"\w*. \w The|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \f + \fr 22:21 \ft WH and BYZ the Lord Jesus Christ; TR our Lord Jesus Christ\f* \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* saints.\f + \fr 22:21 \ft SBL, WH, NE, and TR do not include the saints.\f* Amen.\f + \fr 22:21 \ft SBL, WH, NE, and NA do not include Amen.\f*
